title: Truth-telling and treaty: Australian Indigenous lawyer’s commitment to real change for First Nations People
content: "For me, cultural continuity is both a responsibility and a source of strength. It reminds me of why this work matters and who it is ultimately for."
creator: Kevin Rennie
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: Venezuela inflates release figures as political prisoners remain in limbo
content: As Venezuelan authorities claim a mass release of political prisoners, families wait outside detention centers without answers, or guarantees. Behind the government’s discourse of reconciliation, uncertainty and fear persist.
creator: Gabriela Mesones Rojo
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: Combating the climate crisis to promote peace in Mali
content: Between 1970 and 2020, the country experienced at least 40 major climate shocks, with drought affecting around 400,000 people each year and reducing crop revenues by US$9.5 million annually, according to the World Bank.
creator: Peace News
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: What does Tarique Rahman’s return after nearly 17 years in exile mean for Bangladesh?
content: Tarique Rahman’s return marks a defining moment for Bangladesh’s politics, energizing the Bangladesh Nationalist Party amid deep uncertainty, rising tensions, and an urgent search for democratic leadership.
creator: Abhimanyu Bandyopadhyay
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: A Korean-Chinese women’s handmade Yanbian-style water tofu symbolizes family unity
content: When family members return home, tsodibi becomes the centerpiece of the meal — typically handmade by the women of the extended family, it symbolizes family unity and cooperation.
creator: Jo Carter
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: Third World’s Stephen ‘Cat’ Coore, a Jamaican who straddled musical genres, dies at 69
content: Coore expanded the language of reggae, weaving roots with jazz, soul, funk, classical discipline and global sounds, while never losing Jamaica’s heartbeat. His guitar [...] spoke stories, unity, love and consciousness.
creator: Emma Lewis
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: Meet Filip Ondrušek, the Austrian-Slavic chef who believes that local food reflects national history
content: “Modern reinterpretation of traditional dishes can maintain technical excellence while preserving the emotion, identity, and memories embedded in the food.”
creator: Nevena Borisova
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: Pitching power: Unpacking the T20 Cricket World Cup crisis between Bangladesh and India
content: Bangladesh’s refusal to participate in 2026 T20 Cricket World Cup matches scheduled on Indian soil represents far more than a diplomatic standoff or a security dispute.
creator: Zulker Naeen
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: The peacemakers: Meet Venezuelans who are fighting to free political detainees
content: In Venezuela, relatives and human-rights NGOs have stepped up calls for the immediate release of more than 800 victims of politically-motivated persecution of the government formerly led by Nicolás Maduro.
creator: Estefanía Salazar
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: The hidden cost of India’s restriction on Bangladeshi visas
content: Since the August 2024 political upheaval in Bangladesh, India has restricted most visas for Bangladeshis, weakening people-to-people ties between the two countries and causing broader economic consequences.
creator: Zulker Naeen
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: What does ‘partnership’ really mean for Africa and the European Union?
content: While the African Union designated 2025 as the Year of Reparations, European engagement throughout the year largely remained confined to acknowledgements rather than commitments.
creator: Adesewa Olofinko
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: Art captured by ideology: How the Taliban silenced Afghanistan’s cinema industry
content: The first requirement is that the film’s script must initially be submitted to the Taliban, and after the film is completed, it must be reviewed again.
creator: Hasht-e-Subh Daily
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: When children disclose abuse, families in rural Andhra Pradesh, India, often respond with silence
content: What happens after a child discloses an abuse is determined not only by law, but by the social worlds families must navigate once silence is broken.
creator: Karuna kumari Kandregula
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: Thais and Cambodians speak out against the looming war
content: Peace advocates said the war has done nothing for the Thais and Cambodians who have lived together for generations along the 800 km border
creator: Prachatai
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world

title: A voice for the unheard in Myanmar: From the Rakhine coast to the frontlines of truth
content: "We decided to present the resilience of female journalists across Myanmar who are working in war-torn areas, rather than focusing solely on our own story."
creator: Exile Hub
sourceDescription: Citizen media stories from around the world
